mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stock_request(shop_id, product_id, amount, request_date, approval, admin_approval) VALUES (#{shop_id}, #{product_id}, #{amount}, SYSDATE(), "대기", "대기")
mapper.select: SELECT employee_id FROM shop WHERE shop_id = #{shop_id}

SELECT stock_request_id, s.name AS shop_name, request_date, e.name AS employee_name, approval, sr.product_id, p.name AS product_name, amount, sr.shop_id FROM stock_request sr JOIN product p ON sr.product_id=p.product_id JOIN shop s On sr.shop_id=s.shop_id JOIN employee e ON s.employee_id=e.employee_id WHERE sr.shop_id=#{shopid}

SELECT e.name AS employee_name, f.feedback_content, f.creation_date FROM feedback f JOIN stock_request sr ON f.stock_request_id=sr.stock_request_id JOIN shop s ON sr.shop_id=s.shop_id JOIN employee e ON s.employee_id=e.employee_id WHERE f.stock_request_id=#{formid}
